backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a multi-agent debate system with user profiles, agent registry (9 pre-populated agents with different types), debate state management, file storage integration, and role-based access control using authorization and blob-storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three requirements: removing loading guards from main App.tsx layout, implementing strict early return patterns in Boardroom component, and implementing strict early return patterns in SwarmHealth component with specific conditional rendering order.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing implementation details including strict early return patterns, speech recognition/synthesis hooks, reduced polling intervals, error handling, and tactical dark UI components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH-based neutral grayscale color palette supporting light and dark modes, defining CSS custom properties for UI components including sidebar, charts, and form elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for 'The Gang' application with root div and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component with Header/Navbar always rendered, BoardroomTab implementing strict early return pattern (isLoading, !isAuthenticated, !actor checks), debate controls with push-to-talk and interrupt functionality, emergency mode alerts, and tab navigation for boardroom/sensory/health views.
frontend/src/components/AgentRegistryTab: Agent registry table component with tactical dark aesthetic displaying agent status indicators, kill switch toggles using proper arrow function handlers with comprehensive try/catch/finally error handling, and loading/error states for backend actor initialization.
frontend/src/components/DebateDisplay.ts: Displays a debate transcript with color-coded messages from different speakers (Skippy, GLaDOS, Robby, SYSTEM, User), showing emergency mode badge and debate status, with text-to-speech playback for Robby's messages when authenticated.
Provides a button to interrupt/stop an ongoing debate by canceling speech synthesis and calling the backend's abortDebate mutation.
frontend/src/components/PushToTalkButton: Implements a push-to-talk button using speech recognition that starts/stops listening on click and calls onTranscriptComplete callback with the recognized text when recording stops.
frontend/src/components/SensoryCortexTab: Handles file uploads (drag-and-drop, manual, camera) by chunking files into 1.8MB pieces, generating previews for text/images, and routing documents to appropriate agents via the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout, managing identity state and delegation validity with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for debate operations (start, abort, status polling), document routing, and agent status management with automatic cache invalidation.
Wraps the Web Speech Recognition API to provide start/stop listening controls, transcript state, and error handling with automatic cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: React hook that wraps the Web Speech API for text-to-speech, providing speak/cancel functions with optional British male voice selection and tracking speaking state.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeWordStub.ts: Commented-out stub for future Picovoice Porcupine wake word detection integration that would trigger speech recognition automatically.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors using OKLCH color space, including design tokens for UI components and charts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/transcriptParser.ts: Utility function that sanitizes transcript text by stripping HTML table tags and converting URLs and markdown links to clickable anchor elements.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and cleanup capabilities for sensitive parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining custom color system using OKLCH variables, container settings, border radius tokens, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata documenting The Gang multi-agent system architecture with 9 canisters, known React rendering issues, existing features, and architectural constraints including 390GB storage cap and 1.8MB chunk limits.
